subject: Re: User email address enumeration vulnerability on soov.ee
bodyHtml:
Hello,

We are pleased to inform you, that we reassessed soov.ee 
on 2025-05-10 and have found that the previously identified
account enumeration vulnerability is now sufficiently mitigated.

We appreciate your attention and action in addressing this
security concern.

Thank you,

Gregor Eesmaa
Computer Science MSc student
University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science
